description: Try our easy to follow Quick Baked Salmon With Asian Greens On Rice recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Fish dishes,Quick & easy dinner,Microwave,High fibre,High protein,Tree nut free,Rice,Dinner Made Easy,Salmon
name: Quick Baked Salmon With Asian Greens On Rice Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 280g Simply Cook Sauté Kit Asian Greens (reserve crispy shallots to garnish)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180°C and line a baking tray with baking paper.
Coat salmon fillets with half of the teriyaki sauce, then place on prepared baking tray and bake for 10-12 minutes or until tender and cooked through.
Meanwhile, add oil to a medium saucepan and sauté the Asian greens for 2-3 minutes with remaining teriyaki sauce. At the same time, microwave rice according to packet instructions.
Divide rice amongst bowls and top with vegetables and salmon. Sprinkle over crispy shallots to serve.
